import React,{useState} from 'react'; // import {GoogleLogin,GoogleLogout} from 'react-google-login' // import GoogleButton from 'react-google-button' import './Login.css' export default function login(props){ const translatelogin=()=>{ var a=document.querySelector('.Login').style if(a.transform==="translateY(-2000px)"){ a.transform="translateY(0px)"; } else{ a.transform="translateY(-2000px)"; } } const [users,]=useState() const { email, setEmail, password, setPassword, handleLogin, handleSignUp, hasAccount, setHasAccount, emailError, passwordError, }=props; return ( <>
Login
Get access to your Orders, Wishlist and Recommendations
SuKart
setEmail(e.target.value)} />

{emailError}

setPassword(e.target.value)} />

{passwordError}

{hasAccount?( <>
Sign in

Don't have an Account ? setHasAccount(!hasAccount)}> Sign up

):( <>
Sign up

Already have an Account ? setHasAccount(!hasAccount)}> Sign in

)}

or

{/* { console.log('Google button clicked') }} /> */} {/* */}
Login with Google
Only for BITSians,
Login with BITS ID only
) }
